.. _liens:

Liens utiles
============

* `Code Conventions for the JavaScript Programming Language <http://javascript.crockford.com/code.html>`_
* `Augmenting YUI3 module objects <http://mattsnider.com/javascript/augmenting-yui3-module-objects>`_
* `YUI2 to YUI3 <http://yuilibrary.com/projects/yui3/wiki/YUI2ToYUI3>`_
* `Building YUI3 custom modules <http://www.slideshare.net/caridy/building-yui-3-custom-modules>`_
* `The YUI Global Object: Compose Classes of Objects with augment <http://yuilibrary.com/yui/docs/yui/yui-augment.html>`_
* `Sphinx documentation <http://sphinx.pocoo.org/contents.html>`_
* `Original reStructuredText documentation <http://docutils.sourceforge.net/rst.html>`_
